original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 307.20/308 against the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields were steady at open on Friday and the rupee opened at 307.20/308.00 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 was quoted at 26.30/27.00 percent, unchanged from Wednesday’s close.
The rupee opened at 307.20/308.00 against the US dollar in the spot market weaker from yesterday’s close at 305.80/306.20. (Colombo/May19/2023)
